description: Live compile SCSS files to CSS and serve index.html

scripts.init: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (!fs.existsSync('scss')) { fs.mkdirSync('scss'); } if (!fs.existsSync('scss/styles.scss')) { fs.writeFileSync('scss/styles.scss', ''); }"
scripts.start:scss: npm run init && npm run compile:scss
